Home > MLVcode > edges-master > toolbox-master > external > toolboxGenDoc.m

toolboxGenDoc

PURPOSE

Generate documentation, must run from dir toolbox.

SYNOPSIS

function toolboxGenDoc

DESCRIPTION 

 Generate documentation, must run from dir toolbox.

 1) Make sure to update and run toolboxUpdateHeader.m
 2) Update history.txt appropriately, including w current version
 3) Update overview.html file with the version/date/link to zip:
     edit external/m2html/templates/frame-piotr/overview.html

 USAGE
  toolboxGenDoc

 INPUTS

 OUTPUTS

 EXAMPLE

 See also

 Piotr's Computer Vision Matlab Toolbox      Version 3.40
 Copyright 2014 Piotr Dollar.  [pdollar-at-gmail.com]
 Licensed under the Simplified BSD License [see external/bsd.txt]

  • function lines = readFile( fName )
  • function writeFile( fName, lines )

0002 % Generate documentation, must run from dir toolbox.

0004 % 1) Make sure to update and run toolboxUpdateHeader.m
0005 % 2) Update history.txt appropriately, including w current version
0006 % 3) Update overview.html file with the version/date/link to zip:

0019 %
0020 % Piotr's Computer Vision Matlab Toolbox      Version 3.40
0021 % Copyright 2014 Piotr Dollar.  [pdollar-at-gmail.com]
0022 % Licensed under the Simplified BSD License [see external/bsd.txt]
0023 
0024 % Requires external/m2html to be in path.
0025 cd(fileparts(mfilename('fullpath'))); cd('../');
0026 addpath([pwd '/external/m2html']);
0027 
0028 % delete temporary files that should not be part of release
0029 fs={'pngreadc','pngwritec','rjpg8c','wjpg8c','png'};
0030 for i=1:length(fs), delete(['videos/private/' fs{i} '.*']); end
0031 delete('detector/models/*Dets.txt');
0032 
0033 % delete old doc and run m2html
0034 if(exist('doc/','dir')), rmdir('doc/','s'); end
0035 dirs={'channels','classify','detector',...
0036   'images','filters','matlab','videos'};
0037 m2html('mfiles',dirs,'htmldir','doc','recursive','on','source','off',...
0038   'template','frame-piotr','index','menu','global','on');
0039 
0040 % copy custom menu.html and history file
0041 sDir='external/m2html/templates/';
0042 copyfile([sDir 'menu-for-frame-piotr.html'],'doc/menu.html');
0043 copyfile('external/history.txt','doc/history.txt');
0044 
0045 % remove links to private/ in the menu.html files and remove private/ dirs
0046 for i=1:length(dirs)
0047   name = ['doc/' dirs{i} '/menu.html'];
0048   fid=fopen(name,'r'); c=fread(fid,'*char')'; fclose(fid);
0049   c=regexprep(c,'<li>([^<]*[<]?[^<]*)private([^<]*[<]?[^<]*)</li>','');
0050   fid=fopen(name,'w'); fwrite(fid,c); fclose(fid);
0051   name = ['doc/' dirs{i} '/private/'];
0052   if(exist(name,'dir')), rmdir(name,'s'); end
0053 end
0054 
0055 % postprocess each html file
0056 for d=1:length(dirs)
0057   fs=dir(['doc/' dirs{d} '/*.html']); fs={fs.name};
0058   for j=1:length(fs), postProcess(['doc/' dirs{d} '/' fs{j}]); end
0059 end
0060 
0061 end
0062 
0063 function postProcess( fName )
0064 lines=readFile(fName);
0065 assert(strcmp(lines{end-1},'</body>') && strcmp(lines{end},'</html>'));
0066 % remove m2html datestamp (if present)
0067 assert(strcmp(lines{end-2}(1:22),'<hr><address>Generated'));
0068 if( strcmp(lines{end-2}(1:25),'<hr><address>Generated on'))
0069   lines{end-2}=regexprep(lines{end-2}, ...
0070     '<hr><address>Generated on .* by','<hr><address>Generated by');
0071 end
0072 % remove crossreference information
0073 is=find(strcmp('<!-- crossreference -->',lines)); 
0074 if(~isempty(is)), assert(length(is)==2); lines(is(1):is(2))=[]; end
0075 % insert Google Analytics snippet to end of file
0076 ga={ '';
0077   '<!-- Start of Google Analytics Code -->';
0078   '<script type="text/javascript">';
0079   'var gaJsHost = (("https:" == document.location.protocol) ? "https://ssl." : "http://www.");';
0080   'document.write(unescape("%3Cscript src=''" + gaJsHost + "google-analytics.com/ga.js'' type=''text/javascript''%3E%3C/script%3E"));';
0081   '</script>';
0082   '<script type="text/javascript">';
0083   'var pageTracker = _gat._getTracker("UA-4884268-1");';
0084   'pageTracker._initData();';
0085   'pageTracker._trackPageview();';
0086   '</script>';
0087   '<!-- end of Google Analytics Code -->';
0088   '' };
0089 lines = [lines(1:end-3); ga; lines(end-2:end)];
0090 % write file
0091 writeFile( fName, lines );
0092 end
0093 
0094 function lines = readFile( fName )
0095 fid = fopen( fName, 'rt' ); assert(fid~=-1);
0096 lines=cell(10000,1); n=0;
0097 while( 1 )
0098   n=n+1; lines{n}=fgetl(fid);
0099   if( ~ischar(lines{n}) ), break; end
0100 end
0101 fclose(fid); n=n-1; lines=lines(1:n);
0102 end
0103 
0104 function writeFile( fName, lines )
0105 fid = fopen( fName, 'w' );
0106 for i=1:length(lines); fprintf( fid, '%s\r\n', lines{i} ); end
0107 fclose(fid);
0108 end
